info.title: TRAVEL COMPOSITOR API
info.description:
Documentation:

  • Introduction
  • Accommodation API
  • Transport API
  • Transfer API
  • Closed Tour API
  • Ticket API
  • Webhooks

tags.name: Book - Accommodation
tags.description:
Booking flow:
1 - Quote accommodations
2 - Quote single accommodation (It is recommended to retrieve all combinations of a accommodation if the 'quoteSingleNeeded' quote accommodation attribute is true.)
3 - Confirm accommodation
4 - Prebook accommodation
5 - Book accommodation

Postman flow example

tags.name: Book - Closed Tour
tags.description:
Booking flow:
1 - Quote Closed Tour
2 - Confirm Closed Tour
3 - Prebook Closed Tour
4 - Book Closed Tour

Postman flow example

tags.name: Book - Multi-engine
tags.description:
Booking flow:
1 - Quote transports and accommodations
2 - Confirm
3 - Prebook
4 - Book

Postman flow example

tags.name: Book - Ticket
tags.description:
Booking flow:
1 - Quote tickets
2 - Quote single ticket
3 - Confirm ticket
4 - Prebook ticket
5 - Book ticket

Postman flow example

tags.name: Book - Transfer
tags.description:
Booking flow:
1 - Quote Transfer
2 - Confirm Transfer
3 - Prebook Transfer
4 - Book Transfer

Postman flow example

tags.name: Book - Transports
tags.description:
Booking flow:
1 - Quote transports
2 - Confirm transport/s
3 - Prebook transport/s
4 - Book transport/s

Postman flow example

post.description:
This method create the book of a combination for an accommodation.

- combinationKey is the key returned in /booking/accommodations/{accommodationId}/prebook.

- The fakeBooking attribute is optional. If not sent, the booking will be closed as BOOKED in the test environment or real state in real environment. To close the booking correctly the status must be BOOKED. If you want to simulate an error, you can send BOOK_ERROR. With the attribute fakeBooking the booking will not be persisted in the system.

get.description: This method return the booking of accommodation.

put.description: This method refreshes the booking by retrieving the data from the provider.

delete.description: This method cancel the booking of accommodation

post.description:
This method returns the confirmation of a rate for an accommodation.

- It also returns the required passenger fields for that accommodation. The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- combinationKey is the combination selected in /booking/accommodations/{accommodationId}/quote

get.description: This method refund the amount of the penalty in the case of cancellation of the booking on the current day.

post.description:
This method create the prebook of a rate for an accommodation.

- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- combinationKey is the key returned in /booking/accommodations/{accommodationId}/confirm

This method returns the best accommodation combinations by default. To return all available combinations, the bestCombinations parameter must be set to false..

- The combinationKey attribute is all that is needed to book a combination of an accommodation. Always use the combinationKey from the previous step.

This method returns all combinations of an accommodation.

- The combinationKey attribute is all that is needed to book a combination of an accommodation. Always use the combinationKey from the previous step.

get.description: This method returns a accommodation datasheet.
To retrieve the accommodation datasheet use '/accommodations/{accommodationId}/datasheet' or '/accommodations/datasheet'

get.summary: Returns a list of accommodations datasheet
get.description: This method returns a list of accommodations datasheet.
This method returns preferred accommodations in a given microsite. You can filter by country or destination and get the names in several languages.
This method returns the list of agencies of a given microsite.

put.description: This method updates an existing agency. If you need to create a new agency you have to invoke the POST variant

post.description: This method creates a new agency. If you need to update an existing agency you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns information about an agency, given its identifier

get.summary: Return agency credit balance by its ID
get.description: This method returns information about the credit balance of an agency, given its identifier.

put.summary: Increase the credit of an existing agency by its ID
put.description: This method increases the credit of an existing agency, given its identifier

get.summary: Return agency manager by its ID
get.description: This method returns information about an agency manager, given its identifier
This method return all airlines available for a given microsite

post.description: This method is the first one you have to invoke, so it will return a valid API token. You need this API token in order to invoke any other method. A valid auth token expires after some time, so you'll need to get another token when the first one expires

get.summary: Return bookings basic data by operator or microsite
get.description: This method queries for trip bookings. You can filter by operator or by microsite (if you have authorization to do so). You must enter a range of dates to search for bookings

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Reference (booking reference, provider booking reference, order number, deferred order number, PNR)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: User's Name that made the booking

put.description: This method cancels a service from a booking

get.summary: Return bookings by operator or microsite
get.description: This method queries for trip bookings. You can filter by operator or by microsite (if you have authorization to do so). You must enter a range of dates to search for bookings

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Reference (booking reference, provider booking reference, order number, deferred order number, PNR)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: User's Name that made the booking

get.description: This method refund the amount of the penalty in the case of cancellation of the booking on the current day.

put.description: This method close an existing Client Request.

post.description: This method creates a Client Request and attach to indicated booking.If you need to open, create or reply an existing Client Request you have to invoke the PUT function

put.description: This method opens an existing Client Request.

post.summary: Reply to an existing client request
post.description: This method allow to reply to an existing Client Request.

put.description: This method updates an existing closed tour. If you need to create a new ticket, you have to invoke the POST variant. WARNING: price field is deprecated and will be ignored. Prices are now loaded directly into each closed tour option.

post.description: This method creates a new closed tour for a specific supplier. If you need to update and existing closed tour, you have to invoke the PUT variant. WARNING: price field is deprecated and will be ignored. Prices are now loaded directly into each closed tour option.

get.summary: Return closed tour by its code
get.description: This method returns an specific closed tour given its code and supplier. WARNING: price field is deprecated and will always be 0. Prices are now loaded directly into each closed tour option.

put.summary: Updates an existing closed tour option
put.description: This method updates and existing closed tour option. If you need to create a new closed tour option, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.summary: Creates a new closed tour option
post.description: This method creates a new option for an existing closed tour. If you need to update an existing closed tour option, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.summary: Return closed tour options by code
get.description: This method returns available options for a given closed tour.

post.description:
This method create the book of a modality for an closed tour.

- tourKey is the key returned in /booking/closedtour/{closedTourId}/prebook
- The fakeBooking attribute is optional. If not sent, the booking will be closed as BOOKED in the test environment or real state in real environment. To close the booking correctly the status must be BOOKED. If you want to simulate an error, you can send BOOK_ERROR. With the attribute fakeBooking the booking will not be persisted in the system.

get.description: This method return the booking of closed Tour.

put.description: This method refreshes the booking by retrieving the data from the provider.

delete.description: This method cancel the booking of closedtour

post.description: This method returns the confirmation of a rate for a Closed Tour. </br>
This method returns the confirmation of a rate for a Closed Tour. </br>

get.description: This method refund the amount of the penalty in the case of cancellation of the booking on the current day.

post.summary: Get possible closed Tour additional data
post.description: This method returns the possible additional data to perform the quote request.</br> </br>

This method create the prebook of a modality for a closed tour.

- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- tourKey is the key returned in /booking/closedtour/{closedTourId}/confirm
This method returns the chosen closed tour. It will also return the available modalities with their prices.</br> </br>

delete.description: This method Deletes a custom closedtour data sheet data

get.description: This method returns a Closed Tour data
This method returns a Custom Closed Tour Datasheet data

put.description: This method updates a Custom Closed Tour Datasheet data

post.description: This method returns a provider Closed Tour Datasheets data

get.description: This method returns a Closed Tour Datasheet data

post.description: This method returns Closed Tours. Filter

get.description: This method return the price calendar of a cruise given its ID
This method returns the destinations and the departure time of an itinerary given an ID
This method returns the characteristics and the benefits of a cruise lines
This method returns all the cruises of a microsite. You can filter by region, month, port, nights, cruise line and ship.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: To filter by month use yearMonth format(YYYY-MM)

get.summary: Return a port by its id
get.description: This method returns the port of a CruiseService by its ID
This method returns all the downloaded ports. You can filter by cruise line.
This method returns the ship of a CruiseService by its ID
This method returns all the ships of a microsite. You can filter by cruise line.
This method returns countries available in a given microsite. You can get the names in several languages.
This method returns destination by ID. You can get the names in several languages. Available country codes at /resources/destination/countries.
This method returns destinations available in a given microsite. You can filter by country code and get the names in several languages. Available country codes at /resources/destination/countries.
This method return all facilities available. You can get facilities in several languages.
This method returns a list of golf contracts for a given supplier.

put.description: This method updates an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need to create a new ticket, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new golf contract for a specific supplier. If you need to update an existing ticket, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

put.summary: Updates an existing rate for an existing golf contract
put.description: This method updates an existing rate for an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need to create a rate, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.summary: Creates a new rate for an existing golf contract
post.description: This method creates a new rate for an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need to update a rate, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

put.summary: Updates an existing season for an existing golf contract
put.description: This method updates an existing season for an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need to create a new season, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.summary: Creates a new season for an existing golf contract
post.description: This method creates a new season for an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need to update a season, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

put.summary: Update an existing tee time for an existing golf contract
put.description: This method updates an existing tee time for an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need create a new tee time, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.summary: Creates a new tee time for an existing golf contract
post.description: This method creates a new tee time for an existing contract from a specific supplier. If you need to update an existing tee time, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.summary: Return the details of golf contract by its code
get.description: This method returns the details of an specific golf contract given its code.

get.summary: Return holiday package details by its ID
get.description: This method return the day to day details of a given holiday package. You can obtain the holiday package in several languages.

put.description: This method updates the basic info of an existing holiday package. You can obtain the holiday package in several languages and currencies.

get.summary: Return holiday package by its ID
get.description: This method returns the basic info of a holiday package by its ID. You can obtain the ideas in several languages and currencies.

get.summary: Return holiday package calendar by its ID
get.description: This method returns the days in which the holiday package is available and the price associated to that day You can obtain the prices in several currencies.

This method returns the list of holiday packages for a given microsite. You can filter by origin, month and destination (origin and destination codes can be obtained at /resources/destination). You can obtain the packages in several languages and currencies.
This method returns a list of hotels for a given supplier.

put.description: This method updates an existing hotel contract. If you need to create a new contract, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new contract for a specific supplier. If you need to update an existing contract, you have to invoke the PUT variant.
This method add mealplan to contract for a specific supplier
This method add offer to contract for a specific supplier

put.description: This method modifies contract rates for a specific supplier

post.description: This method add rates to contract for a specific supplier
This method add room to contract for a specific supplier
This method add supplement to contract for a specific supplier

get.summary: Return hotel by its provider code
get.description: This method returns an specific hotel given its provider code and supplier.

get.summary: Return idea details by its ID
get.description: This method return the day to day details of a given idea. You can obtain the idea in several languages.

put.description: This method updates the basic info of an existing idea. You can obtain the ideas in several languages and currencies.

get.description: This method returns the basic info of an idea by its ID. You can obtain the ideas in several languages and currencies.
This method returns the list of travel ideas for a given microsite. You can filter by theme, which can be obtained at /resources/theme. You can obtain the ideas in several languages and currencies.
This method return all meal plans available for a given microsite. You can get meal plans in several languages.

post.description:
This method create the book of a multi-engine product.

- The fakeBooking attribute is optional. If not sent, the booking will be closed as BOOKED in the test environment or real state in real environment. To close the booking correctly the status must be BOOKED. If you want to simulate an error, you can send BOOK_ERROR. With the attribute fakeBooking the booking will not be persisted in the system.

This method returns the confirmation of a multi engine. </br> </br>- It also returns the required passenger fields for all engine. The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking. </br>

get.description: This method return the booking of multi-engine product.

post.description: This method create the prebook of a multi-engine product. </br> </br>- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking. </br>

get.description: This method returns the list of travel promotional codes for a given microsite. You can filter by active or type.

put.description: This method updates an existing promotional code for the user's operator with specific microsite.

post.description: This method creates a new promotional code a specific microsite.

get.description: This method returns a providers configuration list by user's microsite
This method returns the basic info of purchase attempt of idea by microsite. You can obtain the ideas in several languages.
This method returns the basic info of purchase attempt by id and microsite. You can obtain the ideas in several languages.
This method returns a contract supplier list by user's operator

post.description: This method creates a new supplier for the user's oeprator. If you need to update an existing supplier,you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns a contract supplier of the user's operator given its ID.

put.description: This method updates an existing supplier for the user's operator.

get.description: This method return all themes available for a given microsite.
This method returns a list of tickets for a given supplier.

put.description: This method updates an existing ticket. If you need to create a new ticket, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new ticket for a specific supplier. IF you need to update an existing ticket, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns an specific ticket given its code and supplier.

put.description: This method updates and existing ticket option. If you need to create a new ticket option, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new option for an existing ticket. If you need to update an existing ticket option, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns available options for a given ticket.
This method return info tickets in a given microsite by ticketId.
This method returns preferred tickets in a given microsite. You can filter by country or destination and get the names in several languages.

post.description:
This method create the book for the selected modality prices.

- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- ticketKey is the key returned in /booking/tickets/prebook

get.description: This method return the booking of ticket.

put.description: This method refreshes the booking by retrieving the data from the provider.

delete.description: This method cancel the booking of a ticket

post.description:
This method returns the confirmation for the selected modality prices.

- It also returns the required passenger fields for that ticket. The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- modalitykey is for each ticket price selected in /booking/tickets/quoteSingleTicket

get.description: This method returns the amount of the penalty in the case of cancellation of the booking on the current day.

post.description:
This method create the prebook for the selected modality prices.

- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- ticketKey is the key returned in /booking/tickets/confirm
This method returns the available tickets.
This method returns the available modalities of the ticket.

get.description: This method returns the list of transfers of a given supplier.

put.description: This method updates an existing transfer service. If you need to create a new transfer, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new transfer service. If you need to update an existing transfer, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns information about an specific transfer given its identifier.
This method returns a list of the available transfer zones.

post.description: This method creates the book of a transfer </br> </br>

get.description: This method returns the transfer booking.

put.description: This method refreshes the booking by retrieving the data from the provider.

delete.description: This method cancels the transfer booking

post.description: This method returns the confirmation for the selected transfer </br> </br>

get.description: This method refunds the amount of the penalty in the case of cancellation of the booking on the current day.

post.description: This method creates the prebook of a modality for a transfer. </br> </br>- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking. </br>
This method returns the available transfers.

get.description: This method returns a list of transports for a given supplier.

put.description: This method updates an existing transport. If you need to create a new ticket, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new transport for a specific supplier. IF you need to update and existing transport, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns an specific transport given its identifier and supplier.

put.description: This method updates and existing transport option. If you need to create a new transport option, you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new option for an existing transport. If you need to update an existing transport option, you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns available options for a given transport.

post.description:
This method create the book of selected transport/s.

- recommendationKey is the key returned in /booking/transports/prebook.

- The fakeBooking attribute is optional. If not sent, the booking will be closed as BOOKED in the test environment or real state in real environment. To close the booking correctly the status must be BOOKED. If you want to simulate an error, you can send BOOK_ERROR. With the attribute fakeBooking the booking will not be persisted in the system.

get.description: This method return the booking of a transport.

put.description: This method refreshes the booking by retrieving the data from the provider.

delete.description: This method cancel the booking of a transport

post.description: This method returns the confirmation of a transport/s. </br> </br>- It also returns the required passenger fields for that transport/s. The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.</br>- It also returns the available extra baggage for each passenger

get.description: This method refund the amount of the penalty in the case of cancellation of the booking on the current day.

post.description:
This method create the prebook of a transport/s.

- The contact person will always be the first passenger of the booking.
- recommendationKey is the key returned in /booking/transports/confirm
This method returns transport availability for a route or a round trip route
This method returns fare families availability for a route or a round trip route

get.summary: Returns a transport base by its code
get.description: This method returns a transport base by its code
This method returns the active transport bases

post.description: Add an amount of rewards to a user

get.description: This method returns the list of users for a given microsite and agency.

put.description: This method updates an existing user. If you need to create a new user you have to invoke the POST variant.

post.description: This method creates a new user. If you need to update an existing user you have to invoke the PUT variant.

get.description: This method returns information about an user given its identifier.
This method returns the list of users for a given microsite.
